posts.title: Linux （CentOS6.5 配置防火墙 开放指定端口）
posts.excerpt: 配置打开配置文件1[root@localhost ~]# vi /etc/sysconfig/iptables
posts.text: 配置打开配置文件1[root@localhost ~]# vi /etc/sysconfig/iptables 配置文件的内容1234567891011121314# Firewall configuration written by system-config-firewall # Manual customization of this file is not recommended. *filter :INPUT ACCEPT [0:0] :FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0] :OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0] -A INPUT -m state –state ESTABLISHED,RELATED -j ACCEPT -A INPUT -p icmp -j ACCEPT -A INPUT -i lo -j ACCEPT -A INPUT -m state –state NEW -m tcp -p tcp –dport 22 -j ACCEPT -A INPUT -m state –state NEW -m tcp -p tcp –dport 80 -j ACCEPT -A INPUT -j REJECT –reject-with icmp-host-prohibited -A FORWARD -j REJECT –reject-with icmp-host-prohibited COMMIT 开启指定端口端口行配置处新起一行写入下面代码 1-A INPUT -m state –state NEW -m tcp -p tcp –dport 8080 -j ACCEPT 重启防火墙1[root@localhost ~]# /etc/init.d/iptables restart 防火墙其它命令查看开放的端口1[root@localhost ~]# /etc/init.d/iptables status 关闭防火墙1[root@localhost ~]# /etc/init.d/iptables stop
